params.name: options
params.description: The options to override default settings.

defaults.name: defaults
defaults.description: An object that represents the default settings.

classitems.description: Enables row selection (to enable multi selection see also `multiSelect`). Default value is `false`.
classitems.name: selection

classitems.description: Enables multi selection (`selection` must be set to `true` as well). Default value is `false`.
classitems.name: multiSelect

classitems.description: Enables entire row click selection (`selection` must be set to `true` as well). Default value is `false`.
classitems.name: rowSelect

classitems.description:
Defines whether the row selection is saved internally on filtering, paging and sorting
(even if the selected rows are not visible).
classitems.name: keepSelection

classitems.description: General search settings to configure the search field behaviour.
classitems.name: searchSettings

classitems.description: The time in milliseconds to wait before search gets executed.
classitems.name: delay

classitems.description: The characters to type before the search gets executed.
classitems.name: characters

classitems.description: Defines whether the data shall be loaded via an asynchronous HTTP (Ajax) request.
classitems.name: ajax

classitems.description:
Ajax request settings that shall be used for server-side communication.
All setting except data, error, success and url can be overridden.
For the full list of settings go to http://api.jquery.com/jQuery.ajax/.
classitems.name: ajaxSettings

classitems.description:
Specifies the HTTP method which shall be used when sending data to the server.
Go to http://api.jquery.com/jQuery.ajax/ for more details.
This setting is overriden for backward compatibility.
classitems.name: method

classitems.description:
Enriches the request object with additional properties. Either a `PlainObject` or a `Function`
that returns a `PlainObject` can be passed. Default value is `{}`.
classitems.name: post

classitems.description:
Sets the data URL to a data service (e.g. a REST service). Either a `String` or a `Function`
that returns a `String` can be passed. Default value is `""`.
classitems.name: url

classitems.description: Defines whether the search is case sensitive or insensitive.
classitems.name: caseSensitive

classitems.description: Transforms the JSON request object in what ever is needed on the server-side implementation.
classitems.name: requestHandler

classitems.description: Transforms the response object into the expected JSON response object.
classitems.name: responseHandler

classitems.description: A list of converters.
classitems.name: converters

classitems.description: Contains all css classes.
classitems.name: css

classitems.description: CSS class to select the parent div which activates responsive mode.
classitems.name: responsiveTable

classitems.description: CSS class to highlight selected rows.
classitems.name: selected

classitems.description: A dictionary of formatters.
classitems.name: formatters

classitems.description: Contains all labels.
classitems.name: labels

classitems.description: Specifies the mapping between status and contextual classes to color rows.
classitems.name: statusMapping

classitems.description: Specifies a successful or positive action.
Specifies a neutral informative change or action.
Specifies a warning that might need attention.
Specifies a dangerous or potentially negative action.
Contains all templates.
classitems.name: templates

classitems.description: Appends rows.
classitems.name: append

params.name: rows
params.description: An array of rows to append

classitems.description: Removes all rows.
classitems.name: clear

classitems.description: Removes the control functionality completely and transforms the current state to the initial HTML structure.
classitems.name: destroy

classitems.description: Resets the state and reloads rows.
classitems.name: reload

classitems.description: Removes rows by ids. Removes selected rows if no ids are provided.
classitems.name: remove

params.name: rowsIds
params.description: An array of rows ids to remove

classitems.description:
Searches in all rows for a specific phrase (but only in visible cells). 
The search filter will be reseted, if no argument is provided.
classitems.name: search

classitems.description:
Selects rows by ids. Selects all visible rows if no ids are provided.
In server-side scenarios only visible rows are selectable.
classitems.name: select

params.name: rowsIds
params.description: An array of rows ids to select

classitems.description:
Deselects rows by ids. Deselects all visible rows if no ids are provided.
In server-side scenarios only visible rows are deselectable.
classitems.name: deselect

params.name: rowsIds
params.description: An array of rows ids to deselect

classitems.description:
Sorts the rows by a given sort descriptor dictionary. 
The sort filter will be reseted, if no argument is provided.
classitems.name: sort

params.name: dictionary
params.description: A sort descriptor dictionary that contains the sort information

classitems.description:
Gets a list of the column settings.
This method returns only for the first grid instance a value.
Therefore be sure that only one grid instance is catched by your selector.
classitems.name: getColumnSettings

return.description: Returns a list of the column settings.

classitems.description:
Gets the current page index.
This method returns only for the first grid instance a value.
Therefore be sure that only one grid instance is catched by your selector.
classitems.name: getCurrentPage

classitems.description:
Gets the current rows.
This method returns only for the first grid instance a value.
Therefore be sure that only one grid instance is catched by your selector.
classitems.name: getCurrentPage

classitems.description:
Gets a number represents the row count per page.
This method returns only for the first grid instance a value.
Therefore be sure that only one grid instance is catched by your selector.
classitems.name: getRowCount

return.description: Returns the row count per page.

classitems.description:
Gets the actual search phrase.
This method returns only for the first grid instance a value.
Therefore be sure that only one grid instance is catched by your selector.
classitems.name: getSearchPhrase

classitems.description:
Gets the complete list of currently selected rows.
This method returns only for the first grid instance a value.
Therefore be sure that only one grid instance is catched by your selector.
classitems.name: getSelectedRows

classitems.description:
Gets the sort dictionary which represents the state of column sorting.
This method returns only for the first grid instance a value.
Therefore be sure that only one grid instance is catched by your selector.
classitems.name: getSortDictionary

classitems.description:
Gets a number represents the total page count.
This method returns only for the first grid instance a value.
Therefore be sure that only one grid instance is catched by your selector.
classitems.name: getTotalPageCount

classitems.description:
Gets a number represents the total row count.
This method returns only for the first grid instance a value.
Therefore be sure that only one grid instance is catched by your selector.
classitems.name: getTotalRowCount
